author: Press
title: Market Report Global Synthetic Zeolites Market published
text:
(MENAFN Press) ACCESS REPORT: 
About Synthetic Zeolites
Zeolites are a group of hydrated aluminum silicates which are abundantly available in nature. Zeolites are further synthesized to meet specific application demands. Synthetic zeolite is a three-dimensional structure with ion exchange properties. Few popular synthetic zeolites are Zeolite A Zeolites X and Y ZSM-5 and titanium silicates.
Rising demand for adsorbents detergents and catalysts is expected to fuel the global synthetic zeolites market during the forecast period. APAC is the leading consumer of synthetic zeolite products followed by Europe and North America.
AVAIL SAMPLE REPORT @ 
Technavio’s analysts forecast the global synthetic zeolites market to grow at a CAGR of 12.80% by volume during 2014-2019.
Covered in this Report
This report covers the present scenario and the growth prospects of the global synthetic zeolites market for 2015-2019. The report provides data on the following segments of the market:
• By geography: APAC Europe North America and ROW
• By application: detergents adsorbents catalysts and others
ENQUIRE @ 
Technavio's report Global Synthetic Zeolites Market 2015-2019 has been prepared based on an in-depth market analysis with inputs from industry experts. The report includes a comprehensive discussion on the market segmented by geography; it also provides an extensive coverage on various applications and end-uses of zeolites considering both the existing market landscape and its growth prospects in the coming years. The report further includes a discussion of the key vendors operating in this market and a comment on the vendors’ product portfolios.
